name: Thai Classical Music
description: Emerged from the royal courts of Central Thailand around the 13th century, based on a traditional Thai sound-scale of seven tempered notes.

children.name: Fon leb
children.description: Traditional performance music originating in northern Thailand consist of an ensemble with Piphat instruments and a pair of female choreographers.

children.name: Khrueang sai
children.description: Thai Classical Music emphasizing string instruments while also incorporating other kinds of instruments to enrich the sound.
